content:
Hi, the SDC IG is getting the following NullPointerException on DataRenderer. It started happening after version 1.1.22. It seems to be raising an exception on referenced value sets that are contained in the resource.

onGenerate:
Exception generating resource /Users/jgarcia/Projects/FHIR/git/sdc/input/examples/questionnaire-sdc-profile-example-form-behavior::Questionnaire/questionnaire-sdc-profile-example-form-behavior#LL358-3: null (00:51.0856)
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.DataRenderer.display(DataRenderer.java:243)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.describeStatus(CanonicalRenderer.java:134)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.describeStatus(CanonicalRenderer.java:130)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.genSummaryCore1(CanonicalRenderer.java:85)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.summaryTable(CanonicalRenderer.java:63)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateOutputsValueSet(Publisher.java:7444)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateResourceHtml(Publisher.java:6606)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateHtmlOutputs(Publisher.java:6580)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generate(Publisher.java:4849)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:871)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:717)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8276)
   org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.DataRenderer.display(DataRenderer.java:243)         (00:51.0856)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.describeStatus(CanonicalRenderer.java:134) (00:51.0857)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.describeStatus(CanonicalRenderer.java:130) (00:51.0857)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.genSummaryCore1(CanonicalRenderer.java:85) (00:51.0857)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.CanonicalRenderer.summaryTable(CanonicalRenderer.java:63) (00:51.0858)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateOutputsValueSet(Publisher.java:7444) (00:51.0858)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateResourceHtml(Publisher.java:6606) (00:51.0858)
   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateHtmlOutputs(Publisher.java:6580) (00:51.0859)

   org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8276)            (00:51.0860)

Complete log here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/branches/master/failure/build.log
a fix for this is literally in the build pipeline right now
